extension.news:
[COLOR orange][B]WatchNixtoons2[/B][/COLOR] - Cartoons & Anime [B]0.5.8:[/B] - Fixed Search by Genre - Changed more domain references to wcofun.com
[B]0.5.7:[/B] - Changed domain to wcofun.com
[B]0.5.6:[/B] - Fix Error from clean titles when viewing a show with martipart episodes - Fix Chapter select for episodes
[B]0.5.5:[/B] - Fix Error from clean titles when there is no episode (specials)
[B]0.5.4:[/B] - Fix times episode search point could not be found
[B]0.5.3:[/B] - Fix Thumbnails in latest section (when enabled)
[B]0.5.2:[/B] - Fix Error when clean titles is enabled
[B]0.5.1:[/B] - Fix Latest Section
[B]0.5.0:[/B] - Python 3 Compatible
extension.description:
Watch cartoons and anime from [COLOR orange][B]www.wcofun.com[/B][/COLOR].
Support the WatchCartoonOnline website with a PayPal donation to: [COLOR khaki][B]wcohelp@yandex.com[/B][/COLOR]
Add-on originally by doko.
extension.disclaimer: The authors of this addon do not host any of the content found or have any affiliation with the content providers. This add-on only scrapes web pages.
